title: LFM Plat+ Mid laner and Top
body:
Hey League community we are Re'Mend eSports are currently looking for a Top laner that meet these requirements:

-Plat+
-Can play during the week after work and the weekends
-Has a wide champion pool
-Dosen't tilt
-Willing to improve
-Non-Toixc

If interested add Mickawesome
Cheers
